features: ✅【3 IN 1 WIRELESS CHARGER STATION】3 in 1 Wireless charger includes three charging modules for mobile phones, earphones, and watches,which can charge three devices at the same time, convenient and efficient.Perfectly solving the problem of charging multiple devices.The maximum power of mobile phone charging is 15W, Airpods charging is 3W, iWatch charging is 2.5W.

✅【FOLDING DESIGN & MAGNETIC SUCTION】Our 3 in 1 Foldable Wireless Charger has a 180° foldable design that quickly turns into a phone stand. The Magsafe strong magnetic module firmly attaches to iPhone 15/14/13 phones and will not slip off even when shaken. It can be charged horizontally or stand up as a phone stand, with a variety of folding options available.

✅【EASY TO CARRY】The Magnetic Travel Wireless Charging Station is made of soft silicone material, which can be bent repeatedly. Slim and compact, foldable storage, compact and foldable design, easy to put in your pocket or backpack, does not take up space, easy to carry, very suitable for office and travel.

✅【SAFE MULTI PROTECTION】The wireless charger is Qi certified, with smart protection technology, overvoltage protection, short circuit protection, overcurrent protection, etc., to ensure your device is charged quickly and safely without worrying about damaging the device battery. It adopts multi-functional intelligent shunt technology and built-in intelligent chip to provide you with a better and safer charging experience.

✅【WIDE COMPATIBILIT】Compatible with IPhone 15/Pro/Pro Max/iPhone 14/13/Pro/Pro Max/mini/iPhone 12/Pro/Pro Max/mini; iPhone 11/ Pro/Pro Max, iPhone X, iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, iPhone XR, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S22, S21 S20 Series(Wireless Charging); AirPods 2/3/Pro/Pro 2; iWatch 2/3/4/5/6/SE/SE2/7/8. All other Qi wireless-enabled devices.(Not compatible with iWatch 1, Samsung and other brands of watches)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose PEAPOLET 3-in-1 foldable wireless charger? We designed this model after much research in order to create a lightweight and simple 3-in-1 foldable magnetic wireless charger. It combines the advantages of wireless charging and avoids the disadvantages. This magnetic folding charger is worth taking home, with its ideal size, compactness and lightness, multi-dimensional use, efficiency and convenience, and safety protection. Use it to charge your iPhone, iWatch and AirPods. It will be perfect for everyday use and travel.

3 in 1 Wireless charger has flexible charging modes，You can use your imagination and use the charger as much as you want. Use it flat, place it on the table regularly, and charge up to Phone & iWatch & AirPods at the same time. Fold it into a stand, watch TV and video chat while charging, and charge up to Phone & iWatch at the same time. You can choose to fold 360° into one charging board, and charge at most one devices.

FOLDS INTO A TRIANGLE STAND When folded into a triangular stand to charge your phone, you can watch videos while charging your phone, and you can also charge your iWatch at the same time FOLD INTO A CHARGING PAD After 360° folding, this 3 in 1 Phone wireless charger becomes a charging board to meet your requirements for minimalism. After purchasing this wireless charger, you are equivalent to having three kinds of chargers and mobile phone holders. Super affordable option. GREAT POCKET SIZE WIRELESS CHARGER After being folded, only half the size of an iPhone, Say goodbye to those endless cables and chargers. The small portable fast charger for iPhone is the perfect apple accessories. This will be a gift that everyone will love.

Warmly Note: 1.Please make sure your device supports wireless charging before use. 2.When you charge your watch, it is recommended to charge it flat or vertically at 90°, do not use 30°, this angle may not be able to charge. 3.Please avoid charging with case thickness more than > 2MM 4.Wireless charging may never be as fast or efficient as wired charging, but it can be a lot more convenient. 5.When the working temperature exceeds 122°F, the charging will be interrupted to avoid damage to the devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charges everything at once.
reviews.reviewText: I use this everyday . I can charge my phone, EarPods and watch at same time with one charger. Can’t beat that with a stick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this in my nightstand and it works great. The magnetic connection ensures proper alignment and I don’t wake up to a dead phone. Only gripe is the blue charging indicators lights are fairly bright in the dark but easily covered up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my sister when she was visiting me. She loves it when traveling and also uses it at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This charger is weak. Though it will charge, it cannot get apple products to 100% overnight, let alone three devices at a time! Super upset I missed the return window. Do not buy. Does not work. Waste of hard earned money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The size is small and easy to carry in the travels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great at charging
reviews.reviewText: Def had to take my case off but other than that it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a slow charging system so I would leave it on overnight
